meanings.definition: Failure to take proper care or caution.
meanings.sent1: Her carelessness led to a broken vase.
meanings.sent2: His carelessness with the fragile items caused many accidents.
meanings.sent3: The carelessness of the cat knocking over the vase was both funny and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The carelessness of the driver resulted in a collision.
meanings.sent5: The carelessness of the child running with scissors was a disaster waiting to happen.

meanings.sent1: The carelessness of the student resulted in a failed exam.
meanings.sent2: Her carelessness in listening caused her to miss important details.
meanings.sent3: The carelessness of the chef forgetting an ingredient ruined the dish.
meanings.sent4: The carelessness of the hiker not checking the map led to getting lost.
meanings.sent5: The carelessness of the employee in following instructions caused delays.

meanings.sent1: The carelessness of the company in safety protocols led to accidents.
meanings.sent2: His carelessness in handling confidential information jeopardized the project.
meanings.sent3: The carelessness of the gardener forgetting to water the plants resulted in wilting.
meanings.sent4: The carelessness of the government in addressing the issue caused public outcry.
meanings.sent5: The carelessness of the doctor in prescribing the wrong medication had serious consequences.
